long_description: Brooks has fine-tuned the best features of the popular PureFlow(R) 2 shoes to make the men's PureFlow 3 Road-Running Shoes align with your stride even better so you can focus on the road ahead. With a great fit and plenty of cushioning, the PureFlow 3 shoes are designed for those seeking a minimalist feel without having to sacrifice comfort. Shoes are updated with a more rounded heel, a wider instep band and a repositioned toe flex to better align your stride. Lightweight uppers feature highly breathable polyester mesh with synthetic leather overlays to provide a foot-hugging fit. Wide rubber instep band offers the foot arch support without the bulkiness of materials underfoot. Ideal Heel design is updated with a more curved heel to encourage foot contact points to shift you forward, helping align joints and reduce stresses. Split toe groove under the forefoot offers an enhanced sense of connection with the ground. Brooks PureFlow 3 Road-Running Shoes have low-profile rubber outsoles that grip well on the road, sidewalk and gentle trails. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a shorter, lower impact stride than traditional running shoes.
